F=
rank:=A0 Ran the test here in Campeche, Mexico with your audio clip.=A0 I h=
ave no radio here to speak of so evpmaker has been my sole source of EVP te=
sting.=A0 Until now, that is.
=A0
I need help here.=A0 When I listened to y=
our clip real time I did not here the segment attached.=A0 In my editor I p=
icked out a voice that sounded differerent than the other sounds on your cl=
ip.=A0 What I hear in the attached is DIFFERENT PEOPLE.=A0 An interesting c=
omment since I certainly would be a DIFFERENT PERSON having sent your clip =
to Mexico to play and test.=A0 Hopefully we finally have figure out a way t=
o confuse them on the other side.=A0=A0 If RJ and others can confirm what t=
hey hear or don't hear on my tape and your original and give their opinion.=
..that would be great.=A0 
=A0
What would be even greater is if others coul=
d run the same test.=A0 All I did was play your radio clip and trhough my c=
omputer speakers while recording on Goldwave editor.=A0 Listen and then pos=
t.=A0 ron

<DIV>Frank:  Ran =

<DIV>I need help here. =
 When I listened to your clip real time I did not here the segment attached=
